name: Freezing Night
description:
Freezing Night

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

          On a very cold night, you have to survive, craft, and build to defend your house from zombie attacks. Don't get too cold. The bigger your points, the bigger you are. upgrade your house to speed up the addition of your bullets.

PLAYED ON LAPTOP / PC

Control :
Move : WASD
Shoot, Collect : Mouse Left Click
Change Inventory Box : Mouse Wheel

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GOOD LUCK

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assets from : https://www.kenney.nl/assets
Sound Effect from : https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=audio
